template_info.name: Electric-Type Powerhouse
template_info.description: A high-speed electric team focused on paralysis support and lightning-fast attacks
template_info.usage_notes: Electric types excel at speed and paralysis support. Use Thunder Wave strategically to slow down threats and enable sweeps.

pokemon.name: jolteon
pokemon.strategy: Extremely fast special attacker with speed control
pokemon.tips: Often the fastest Pokemon in battle - use this to control pace

pokemon.name: raichu
pokemon.strategy: Powerful electric attacker with weather support
pokemon.tips: Rain Dance makes Thunder 100% accurate and very powerful

pokemon.name: pikachu
pokemon.strategy: Fast utility Pokemon with priority and evasion
pokemon.tips: Double Team + Thunder Wave creates setup opportunities

pokemon.name: electrode
pokemon.strategy: Blazing fast lead with support and self-destruct
pokemon.tips: Set up Light Screen early, then explode for massive damage

pokemon.name: magneton
pokemon.strategy: Bulky steel/electric type with status support
pokemon.tips: Steel typing provides valuable resistances to the team

pokemon.name: electabuzz
pokemon.strategy: Versatile attacker with elemental punch coverage
pokemon.tips: Elemental punches provide coverage against ground types
